alert.note: Alert for Addison; Caledonia; Chittenden; Lamoille; Orange; Washington (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 6:44PM EDT until July 13 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Burlington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Lamoille County in northwestern Vermont... Northern Orange County in central Vermont... Southwestern Caledonia County in northeastern Vermont... Northeastern Addison County in central Vermont... Southeastern Chittenden County in northwestern Vermont... Washington County in central Vermont... * Until 730 PM EDT. * At 643 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Pleasant Valley to Warren, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public reported funnel cloud in Waitsfield, VT. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Barre, Montpelier, Morrisville, Calais, Plainfield, Cambridge, Stowe, Hardwick, Waterbury Village, East Montpelier, Marshfield Village, Waitsfield, Berlin, Fayston, Worcester, Middlesex, Marshfield, Bolton, Cabot Village, and Underhill. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Addison; Caledonia; Chittenden; Lamoille; Orange; Washington
